statements.update: update DAFTASET set NKLAS = #Nklas#, UMEKO = #Umeko# where KDASET like RTRIM(#Kdaset#)+'%' update DAFTASET set MTGLEVEL = #Kdlevel#, KDASET = #Kdaset#, NMASET = #Nmaset#, TYPE = #Type# where ASETKEY = #Asetkey#
update DAFTASET set REV_BY=#Rev_by# and REV_DATE=#Rev_date#
update DAFTASET set REV_BY='' and REV_DATE=null
statements.select: select D.ID, D.ASETKEY, D.KDASET, D.NMASET, D.MTGLEVEL as KDLEVEL, rtrim(D.TYPE) as TYPE, D.UMEKO, D.NKLAS, J.KDKIB, JK.GOLKIB from DAFTASET D left join JNSKIBASET J on J.K_BRG = left(d.KDASET,9) left join JNSKIB JK on JK.KDKIB = J.KDKIB
where 1=1 order by D.KDASET
where 1=1 and left(D.KDASET,4) <> '1.1.' and D.MTGLEVEL = '7' and left(D.KDASET,9)=#Kdaset# order by D.KDASET
where 1=1 and left(D.KDASET,4) <> '1.1.' and D.MTGLEVEL = '7' and left(D.KDASET,9) in(select K_BRG from JNSKIBASET where KDKIB=#Kdkib#) order by D.KDASET
where 1=1 and left(D.KDASET,4) <> '1.1.' and D.MTGLEVEL = '4' and left(D.KDASET,9) in(select K_BRG from JNSKIBASET where KDKIB<'08' and KDKIB<>'06') order by D.KDASET
where 1=1 and left(D.KDASET,4) <> '1.1.' and D.MTGLEVEL = '4' and left(D.KDASET,9) in(select K_BRG from JNSKIBASET where KDKIB='02') order by D.KDASET
where 1=1 and D.MTGLEVEL = '7' and left(D.KDASET,9)=#Kdaset# order by D.KDASET
where 1=1 and left(D.KDASET,4) <> '1.1.' and D.MTGLEVEL = '4' and left(D.KDASET,9) in(select K_BRG from JNSKIBASET where KDKIB in('02','05')) order by D.KDASET
where 1=1 and left(D.KDASET,4) <> '1.1.' and D.MTGLEVEL = '4' and D.ASETKEY not in(select ASETKEY from JNSKIBASET) order by D.KDASET

where 1=1 and left(D.KDASET,4) <> '1.1.' and D.MTGLEVEL = '7' and left(D.KDASET,9)=#Kdaset# and D.ASETKEY not in(select ASETKEY from MAPBLJASET where KDDANA=#Kddana# and THANG = (select rtrim(p.CONFIGVAL) from PEMDA p where p.CONFIGID='cur_thang')) order by D.KDASET

where 1=1 and left(D.KDASET,4) <> '1.1.' and D.MTGLEVEL = '7' and left(D.KDASET,9) in(select K_BRG from JNSKIBASET where KDKIB=#Kdkib#) and D.ASETKEY not in(select ASETKEY from MAPNRCASET) order by D.KDASET

where 1=1 and left(D.KDASET,4) <> '1.1.' and D.MTGLEVEL = '7' and D.ASETKEY in(select ASETKEY from MAPBLJASET where MTGKEY=#Mtgkey# and KDDANA=#Kddana# and THANG=(select rtrim(p.CONFIGVAL) from PEMDA p where p.CONFIGID='cur_thang')) order by D.KDASET

where 1=1 and left(D.KDASET,4) <> '1.1.' and D.MTGLEVEL = '7' and D.ASETKEY in(select ASETKEY from MAPBLJASET where MTGKEY=#Mtgkey# and KDDANA=#Kddana# and THANG=(select rtrim(p.CONFIGVAL) from PEMDA p where p.CONFIGID='cur_thang')) and left(D.KDASET,9)=#Kdaset# order by D.KDASET

where 1=1 and D.MTGLEVEL = '1' union all select D.ID, D.ASETKEY, D.KDASET, D.NMASET, D.MTGLEVEL as KDLEVEL, rtrim(D.TYPE) as TYPE, D.UMEKO, D.NKLAS, J.KDKIB from DAFTASET D left join JNSKIBASET J on J.K_BRG = left(d.KDASET,9) where left(D.KDASET,4) = '1.3.' and left(D.KDASET,6) <> '1.3.6.' order by D.KDASET
where 1=1 and left(D.KDASET,4) <> '1.1.' and D.MTGLEVEL = '4' and left(D.KDASET,9) in(select K_BRG from JNSKIBASET where KDKIB in('02','03','04','07')) order by D.KDASET
where 1=1 and left(D.KDASET,4) = '1.1.' and D.MTGLEVEL = '7'
where 1=1 and left(D.KDASET,15) = '1.5.4.01.01.01.' and D.MTGLEVEL = '7'
where 1=1 and left(D.KDASET,15) = '1.5.4.01.01.02.' and D.MTGLEVEL = '7'
where D.KDASET=#Kdaset#
where 1=1
where D.ASETKEY = #Asetkey#
select min(MTGLEVEL) as KDLEVELMIN from DAFTASET
